errors.error_description: The instruction to 'Get Python 3' is too generic. The project requires at least version 3.6, and a user might have an older, incompatible version like Python 3.5 installed.
correction_candidates: Get the latest version of Python 3

errors.error_description: The command 'make check' is incorrect for verifying the installation. The correct command to run the regression tests is 'make test'.

The instruction for installing the python3-venv package on Ubuntu is missing. This package is required by the 'make' command to create a Python virtual environment, and its absence will cause the setup to fail.
correction_candidates: On Ubuntu, you may also need to install venv: `apt-get install python3-venv`
On Ubuntu, you may also need to install pip: `apt-get install python3-pip`
On all systems, run `pip install virtualenv`
On Ubuntu, you may also need to install venv: `apt-get install python3.8-venv`
errors.golden_answer: On Ubuntu, you may also need to install venv: `apt-get install python3-venv`

errors.error_description: The commands to set up the project are in the wrong order. The 'cd OpenLane' command is executed before 'git clone', so the directory does not exist, causing an error.
correction_candidates:
cd $HOME
mkdir OpenLane
cd OpenLane
git clone https://github.com/The-OpenROAD-Project/OpenLane .
